review.title: “Its a Technology Company & Futuristic Company & working here is joy, learning & challenging experience”
review.pros: Pros – The Solutions offered by Cubix are great. The Products are from L1 to L& but having good expertise in L4 to L7. Cubix Team is good & Competitive & Quality team. Good HR Practices, Skills set development event takes place & Training is arranged to all Employees.
review.cons: Cons – There are no cons in the Company but yes there could be few common things which are common in all Organizations.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – They have always taken care of good Employees & believe they will keep doing that always in future also.

review.title: “No pressure work and v co-ordial management”
review.pros: Pros – No pressure from seniors, work as a team, ready to address problems put forth, its v good place as long as you stay there.. Increment every year based on your performance..
review.cons: Cons – Once you leave the company.. you have to follow up for your PF for atleast and year. Half the time we only hear excuses..
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please improve even after services for both customers and employees.. it would become the best place to work..
